sen.j: 蓮乗寺（れんじょうじ）は、滋賀県野洲市（旧野洲郡中主町）にある天台真盛宗の寺院。
sen.e: Renjo-ji Temple is a temple of the Tendai shinsei sect located in Yasu City, Shiga Prefecture (former Chozu-cho, Yasu county).
Renjo-ji Temple is a temple of the Tendai Shinseishu sect located in Yasu City, Shiga Prefecture (former Chozu-cho, Yasu county).
sen.cmt: Tendai shinsei sect > Tendai Shinseishu sec
sen.e: Renjo-ji Temple is a temple of the Tendai Shinseishu sect located in Yasu City, Shiga Prefecture (former Chozu-cho, Yasu county).

sen.cmt: 清流山の、山の読み方が「さん」か「ざん」か不明です。

sen.e: The principal image is Amida Nyorai.
The principal image is Amida Nyorai.
The principal image is Amida Nyorai.

sen.j: 824年（天長元年）禅源の開山により創建されたと伝えられ、文亀年間（1501年～1504年）に再興されたという。
sen.e: The temple is said to have been founded by Zengen in 824 and restored during 1501-1504.
The temple is said to have been founded by Zengen in 824 and restored during 1501-1504.
The temple is said to have been founded by Zengen in 824 and restored during 1501-1504.
Wooden Bishamon-ten ryuzo (wooden standing statue of the God of Treasure, War)
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。
